actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act for the purpose of increasing the ceiling on the total principal indebtedness which may be outstanding at any one time for operating loans.

summary.text: Amends the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to increase from $50,000 to $200,000 the ceiling on the total principal indebtedness which may be outstanding at any one time for operating loans.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act for the purpose of increasing the ceiling on the total principal indebtedness which may be outstanding at any one time for operating loans.
